summary: Integrates Deployable Traps into Lorecraft - Books and Looting.
descriptionHtml:
Latest notes click the version number above ^^

[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft 2.0+ or 3.0+[/url]. 
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=9463]Deployable Traps LorecraftVersion[/url]. 

Utilising the new improved \"[url=/downloads/file.php?id=9463]Deployable Traps[/url]\" version - specifically for you lovely viewers! Also a required download

Now you can find books in your travels that teach you how to make exciting traps to befuddle your foes! \"Its a Trap!\"

--
[b]Features:[/b]
Books that add recipes to Lorecraft.
Lorecraft dynamic looting.

--
[b]Install:[/b]
Use NMM or [url=/downloads/file.php?id=1840]Wrye Bash[/url] or extract to your Skyrim/Data folder. 
you will need Lorecraft and Deployable Traps too.

--
[b]Usage:[/b]
There are 3 new books to find - which unlock different classes of trap.

--
[b]Conflicts:[/b]
This mod shouldn\'t conflict with anything - that\'s the whole point of ArcaneSmith\'s amazing looting system!

--
[b]Credits:[/b]
ciedeeh for Deployable Traps
ArcaneSmith for Lorecraft
author: ScarabMonkey

files.name: Lorecraft_Traps_1-1
files.changelogHtml:

Now supports Lorecraft 2.0

files.changelogHtml:
